links.title: Dollar wallows near three-year lows, headed for biggest weekly loss...
links.description: The dollar languished near a three-year low against a basket of currencies on Friday, headed for its biggest weekly loss in nine months, as a slew of bearish factors offset support for the U.S. currency from rising Treasury yields amid firming inflation.

links.title: California regulators first to allow multiple revenue streams for energy storage
links.description: The California Public Utilities Commission in mid-January became the first state regulator to issue revenue stacking rules for energy storage projects, but the rules could be more of a starting point than an end point.

links.title: Tesla's Powerpack batteries may be used to support New York's energy grid
links.description: Tesla may team up with a subsidiary of Con Edison, the largest electric company in New York, to integrate its Powerpack batteries into New York power grids. If the proposal is accepted by the New York State Public Service Commission, it could represent a big step forward for Tesla's energy business.

$TSLA "Tesla's Model 3 to make Atlanta debut this weekend at Lenox Square (Photos)" https://www.bizjournals.com/atlanta/news/2018/02/15/teslas-model-3-to-make-atlanta-debut-this-weekend.html?ana=yahoo&yptr=yahoo

links.title: Tesla's Model 3 to make Atlanta debut this weekend at Lenox Square (Photos) - Atlanta Business Chronicle
links.description: The latest Tesla tornado is heading to Atlanta, with the much ballyhooed Model 3's debut coming this weekend in Buckhead. Tesla Inc. (Nasdaq: TSLA) will showcase its new, relatively affordable sedan at the automaker's Lenox Square showroom on Saturday, Feb. 17, inviting the public to see and sit inside the electric vehicle.
